text:
@realDonaldTrump WHAT ABOUT ALL THESE HOSPITALS REPORTING EVERY DEATH AS COVID-19 EVEN WHEN ITS NOT THE CAUSE OF DEATH..??
SEVERAL HOSPITAL EMPLOYEES BEEN POSTING THAT THEY SEEN PEOPLE WHO DIED OF A COMMON HEART ATTACH YET THEIR DEATH CERTIFICATE HAD CAUSE OF DEATH MARKED COVID-19
